#summary Como instalar
#labels Featured

= Requirements =
Maven >= 3 on system PATH.

= Install =
  * Download the last version available;
  * Unzip file;
  * Open a console;
  * On '*specrunner-all*' call '*mvn clean source:jar install*'.

Ps: This is a temporary solution while SpecRunner is not available at Maven Central repository (registration is under process).

= Adicionando a um projeto =
Add the dependency to your project.
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.specrunner</groupId>
    <artifactId>specrunner</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}
For other profiles, the syntax is like:
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.specrunner</groupId>
    <artifactId>specrunner-webdriver</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}
